name: The Gardens, Sydney
desc: A single floor residential apartment complex, built atop an existing building. Redeveloped to be 1, 2, & 3 bedroom apartments - designed with timeless materials, natural light, decor flexibility, and a sense of community.

blocks.title: A Shared Outdoors
blocks.copy: The Gardens complex is designed around a central shared garden space and private balconies, ensuring all occupants have usable outdoor areas. The outdoor space is terraced into multiple levels to create a versatile mixed use space, and afford residents a sense privacy.

blocks.caption: Open air entry garden, featuring tiered recreation spaces, and bicycle storage. All walkways from lifts to apartments are covered.

blocks.title: Natural Air & Light
blocks.copy: The central garden corridor ensures that all apartments have at least 3 sides exposed to natural light, with large windows maximizing air flow and natural light penetration.

blocks.title: Efficient, Flexible, Comfortable
blocks.copy: All apartments are designed to be space efficient, but still comfortable. Custom joinery and sliding doors throughout maximises usable indoor space, while flexible layouts can adapt to a wide range of lifestyles.

blocks.title: 5 Unique Styles
blocks.copy: The complex contains 5 unique apartment layouts, from 1 to 3 bedrooms, in order to accommodate a mix of residents and lifestyles. Larger apartments have ensuites in addition to the main bathroom, and all apartments contain an internal laundry.
